summary: this mod will add (hopefully the followers of fairy tail guild into the world of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
this mod is inspired by the fairy tail anime. if you haven't gotten the idea by now i will try and add my favorite characters from the anime into skyrim.
<br />
<br />right now i am working on Erza.
<br />i do plan on creating natsu wendy gray and maybe lucy.
<br />
<br />after i get those characters added i will think about adding more.
author: Alysius
